section.name: Getting Started with OpenEdge Maverick Framework
section.p: This document (as well as the others in this section) provide an introduction to OpenEdge Maverick Framework and how to use it within a project.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: The goals for and history of this project are stated in this document.
This document provides links to the distributions available for OpenEdge Maverick Framework.
For those who want to build OpenEdge Maverick Framework from source, this document provides step-by-step instructions on the build process.
This document provides a short tutorial on the usage of OpenEdge Maverick Framework.
As there are numerous ways to use this project, some hints are provided as to what we think are the best ways of using it.
